definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: If she tries to tell me what to do again, I'll tell her where to get off.
sentences.chinese: 要是她再想叫我做這做那，我會叫她識相點兒。

definition: to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
to argue/to reason with sb/to talk sense/to be reasonable
to play tricks on/to make fun of/to tease
